title: Just Wedding Cars Launch Campaign To Help People Save Money On Their Sydney Wedding Day
text:
The average cost of a wedding in Australia is $36,700. A leading Sydney wedding car hire company has launched a campaign to give people advice on how to reduce the average cost while still having a day to remember.
A wedding day is one of the most memorable days in a person’s life, but it can also be one of the most expensive. The average cost of a wedding in Australia is $36,700, but not everyone can afford such a high price. That is why Sydney Just Wedding Cars has put together a campaign to help people get married for less.
According to the Sydney Wedding Car Hire Company, a couple on average can take six years to save for their wedding. The time it takes to save for a wedding could be reduced if the cost of a wedding were more affordable says the wedding car hire experts. Statistics also show through the stress of trying to save for a wedding many couples split up. Through the tips and advice provided by Just Wedding Cars, it could reduce the time it takes to save for a wedding.
A spokesman for Just Wedding Cars said: “A wedding does not have to cost $36,700, a bride and groom can get married for a lot less by following our tips.”
Just Wedding Cars put together the following tips for people looking to get married in Sydney and other places around Australia.
The tips include:
1. Wedding Venue
To reduce the cost of the wedding, it would be a good idea to get married and have the wedding reception in the same venue. This cuts down the price hiring two venues and reduces the price of transport.
2. Wedding reception food
When having a buffet a lot of food gets wasted due to the bride and groom ordering too much food or ordering food that the weddings guests do not like. It is important to find out what food the guests will enjoy.
Another way to cut down on the cost of the wedding reception food is to find out if an outside caterer can provide the food. If the venue allows this, then it is advisable to get some Quote: s and speak to a local catering college to see if they would be willing to provide the wedding catering service.
2. Have a wedding that is not in the main wedding season
It is a known fact that the prices of a wedding increase when more people are looking to get married. By getting married outside of the wedding season, the cost of services and the wedding venue could be reduced.
3. Wedding cars
A lot of couples like to transport close family and friends to the wedding venue, which means hiring a number of wedding cars in Sydney. However, Just Wedding Cars has said by using a Limousine that fits up to 10 people; only one wedding car would be needed for close family and friends.
